Introduction

Park Sung Won, better known as Won, is a South Korean singer. In 2018, Won, then known as Sungwon, first appeared and competed in the boy group survival program "Under Nineteen" where he finished seventh place, allowing him to debut as a member of the project boy group 1THE9. After a year, the group disbanded and Sungwon continued to train.

In December 2020, he was revealed as one of the members of Rain Company's upcoming boy group CIIPHER, and that he will be changing his stage name to Won. By March 15, 2021, Won officially debuted as the maknae of CIIPHER. On August 9, 2023, Rain Company announced that Tag, along with Tan, Won, and Dohwan, had left CIIPHER and the agency after a prolonged period of inactivity.

On November 27, 2023, he announced that he would be making his solo debut on December 4, 2023, with the digital single "Even If It's a Lie ft. Dohwan"
